story_parts.text: A lion was going to Disney World. He was so excited to go on all the rides and see all the characters. He was going to have so much fun. On the way to Disney World, the lion saw a sign that said "NO LIONS ALLOWED." He was so sad and disappointed. He turned around and went home.

next_options.0: The lion decides to go to Disney World anyways and sneaks in
next_options.1: The lion is so sad and disappointed that he decides to never go to Disney World again

story_parts.text: The lion decides to go to Disney World anyways and sneaks in. He has so much fun on all the rides and sees all the characters. He is so happy that he was able to go to Disney World.

next_options.0: The lion is caught by security and is escorted out of the park
next_options.1: The lion continues to have fun at Disney World and lives there happily ever after

story_parts.text: The lion is caught by security and is escorted out of the park. He is so sad and disappointed. He turns around and goes home.
